content: *treble_crochet in next treble_crochet chain 11* repeat from * until last treble_crochet treble_crochet in last treble_crochet 14 treble_crochet 13 ch11 spaces round 10 - chain 17 this counts as the first treble_crochet and ch13 turn work *treble_crochet in next treble_crochet chain 13* repeat from * until last treble_crochet treble_crochet in last treble_crochet 14 treble_crochet 13 ch13 spaces © amanda hertz www crochetitbaby etsy com please do not share re-sell redesign or redistribute any of my patterns or photos as they are copyright protected anything you make from these patterns can be sold please just mention that the pattern was created by crochet it baby and/or add the link to my store somewhere in your description thank you half spider web round 11 - chain 70 finish off leaving a 12 inch tail round 12 - attach yarn at fourth chain of beginning ch17 from round 10 chain 70 finish off leaving a 12 inch tail round 13 - attach yarn to fourth treble_crochet from one side of the web chain 70 finish off leaving a 12 inch tail round 14 - attach yarn to fourth treble_crochet from the other side of the web chain 70 finish off leaving a 12 inch tail round 15 - attach yarn to the center of the seventh ch13 space chain 70 finish off leaving a 12 inch tail the 12 inch tails can be use for tying the web into place © amanda hertz www crochetitbaby etsy com please do not share re-sell redesign or redistribute any of my patterns or photos as they are copyright protected anything you make from these patterns can be sold please just mention that the pattern was created by crochet it baby and/or add the link to my store somewhere in your description thank you
